name: Egg Condition: Unblinded
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

A puzzle-platformer game about a chicken inside a non-euclidian universe, full of distortions and a deeply connected. You'll be the protagonist of an adventure through mini-games, parkour and puzzles

>10 hours of gameplay

This is a sequel of my previous game (Egg Condition), I created it without a game engine and it doesn't have a graphical interface. All inside the terminal (cmd)

SERVER DISCORD FOR QUESTIONS: https://discord.gg/gY8cVVgTy9

||| TUTORIAL |||

HOW TO INSTALL?

1. Extract the folder by right-clicking it with the mouse and selecting "Extract All"

2. Open "egg_condition_unblinded_(version).exe"

3. On startup when Microsoft Defender SmartScreen will prevent it simply hit "More info" and in the end "Run anyway"

4. Enjoy the game

5. If you have any problem you can just ask in my discord server

HOW TO PLAY?

1. Play

2. Solve the first puzzle to escape from the second area

3. You are the tutorial, you know everything you should know

Always check for updates :)
